name: TheAwningCompany
0:
”Alexa, Turn On The Patio Shade”
”Alexa, Turn Off The Patio Shade”
”Alexa, Turn Off the Outside Awning”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control all your 'The Awning Company' enabled appliances by spoken command. Say "Alexa, Turn On Bedroom Awning". Now you can control your 'The Awning Company' products from your app or Alexa. 

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your 'The Awning Company' account and discover your shades. You can custom name your shades in the 'The Awning Company' app by navigating to the settings button.
